title: 24Hr+ Stream, 1v1 Tournament, Mini Games, and of course Giveaways!!

embed.description: OCE | Made Gold IV | http://www.twitch.tv/slaterstream Now time to chill | Songrequests | !24hr for info about an upcoming event!

body:
Hey everyone, in case you didn't get it from the title I am running a 24Hr+ stream today
During the stream there will be a bunch of fun things for you to do including a 1v1 tournament with RP prizes for the winner and runner up
I will also be running a bunch of League mini games that anyone can play in. If you want  to get competitive with it grab a friend and enter into the Brothers in Arms mini game, again RP prizes for the winning duo
There is also a bunch of giveaways for other various reasons

Whatever your reason for dropping by; free cash monies, test your 1v1 skills, Chill hang outs, or because I know you and am making you be here under pain of death I am super Psyched to see you. Please hit follow and drop a message in chat

 <3

replies.body: This seems like a scam.. I'm not sold.
